channel.title: Posts on Jordan Tully
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jordan Tully

item.title: Hi Internet
item.description: Hi I’m Jordan You might also see me around as Dolichomps. I am hoping to keep this thing updated with the stuff I do. I pretty much work on making games all day using the wonderful game engine Godot. I’ve recently been working on a plugin that should make it easier to manage networking in multiplayer games. It is not quite ready for the world so stay tuned for updates as it nears a usable state.
